def_cn: 角豆树（果实味似巧克力）
def_en: A carob or carob tree is a Mediterranean tree that stays green all year round. It has dark brown fruit that tastes similar to chocolate.

def_cn: 角豆(常制成粉以替代巧克力)
def_en: The dark brown fruit of the carob tree can be referred to as carob. It is often made into powder and used instead of chocolate.
